name: Jon Grythe Stødle
briefIntro: Programmer · UX Enthusiast · Lover of Pure Functions
fullBio:
Jon has been developing software for over 10 years and is currently assisting companies succeed, as a Senior Consultant at Webstep.

In his spare time he's an open source contributer, Dungeon Master and likes long sessions in front of the computer.

His exploits can be read either on his blog ([https://blog.jonstodle.com](https://blog.jonstodle.com)) or on Twitter ([@jonstodle](https://twitter.com/jonstodle)).
